title: BlitzAnalysiz()
content:
BlitzAnalysiz() Welcome to BitzAnalysiz(), a site focused on in-depth analysis of World of Tanks Blitz statistics.
Other great WoT Blitz sites  BlitzStars - Player statistics BlitzStars Tank Compare - Tank comparison tool Blitz Hangar - Tank knowledge base WoTinspector.com - Tank armor analysis, Replays, Map inspector and more

title: Career stats
content:
This page shows statistics of players’ battles fought during their Blitz “career” until the end of update 6.8.
Battles per player Number of total battles per player in the end of the update 6.8. An average player has played 4902 battles by the end of update 6.8. Median battle count was 2416 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) was 158980 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update (i.e. “90% most inactive” == “10% most active”).
Battles per player table The table below shows the (max) number of battles played until the end of 6.8 by the X% most inactive players. Reading tip: 10% most active players have played more than the 90% most inactive players.
  Show table      % of Players Max battles     0% 1   10% 282   20% 654   30% 1107   40% 1674   50% 2416   60% 3445   70% 4972   80% 7467   90% 12525   100% 158980      Player WR distribution The following graph shows a histogram of players (y-axis) with certain career WR (x-axis). Only players with more than 1000 are included.
Average tier The following graph shows a histogram of share of players (y-axis) average tier (x-axis). Only players with more than 1000 are included.

title: Tier X statistics
content:
This page list statistics of battles fought at tier X during update 6.8.
Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.8.
On average, players played 113 battles. Median was 50 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.8 was 3937 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.
Battles per player table The table below shows the (max) number of battles played during 6.8 by the X% most inactive players. A reading tip: 10% most active players played more than the 90% most inactive players.
  Show table      % of Players Battles during the update     0% 1   10% 3   25% 12   50% 50   75% 139   90% 298   100% 3937      Player WR distribution The following graph shows a histogram of players (y-axis) with certain WR during the update 6.8 (x-axis). Only players with more than 10 battles at the tier are included.
Share of battles per nation per tank type This chart shows share of battles per nation per tank type at tier X.

title: Tier X Tanks

title: Update 6.9
content:
This page list statistics of battles fought during 6.9. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not cumululative/total/lifetime stats unless otherwise mentioned.
Battles per Player The graph shows the number of battles fought per player during the update 6.9. On average, players played 383 battles. Median was 236 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.9 was 7230 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.
Battles per Player - Table The table below shows the (max) number of battles played during 6.9 by the X% most inactive players. Reading tip 10% most active players played more than the 90% most inactive players.
  Show table      % of Players Battles during the update     0% 1   10% 8   25% 50   50% 236   75% 562   90% 959   100% 7230      Player WR Distribution The following graph shows a histogram of players (y-axis) with certain WR during the update 6.9 (x-axis). Only players with more than 50 are included.
Average Tier The following graph shows a histogram of share of players (y-axis) with certain average tier during the update 6.9 (x-axis). Only players with more than 50 are included.
More Statistics by Tier here.
Players by Region This graphs shows players by region in the dataset who have played at least one game. More Statistics by region here. Please note, this does not mean all the players per server, but just those who have been recorded in the BlitzAnalysiz database.
 Tanks with the Highest WR This graph shows the tanks with the highest average WR during update 6.9. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR across all the tanks during the update. Only tanks with more than 100 players are listed. This may filter out few upcoming tanks that are being tested. More Tank Statistics here.

title: Update 6.8
content:
This page list statistics of battles fought during 6.8. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not cumululative/total/lifetime stats unless otherwise mentioned.
Battles per Player The graph shows the number of battles fought per player during the update 6.8. On average, players played 352 battles. Median was 210 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.8 was 6432 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.
Battles per Player - Table The table below shows the (max) number of battles played during 6.8 by the X% most inactive players. Reading tip 10% most active players played more than the 90% most inactive players.
  Show table      % of Players Battles during the update     0% 1   10% 8   25% 45   50% 210   75% 514   90% 890   100% 6432      Player WR Distribution The following graph shows a histogram of players (y-axis) with certain WR during the update 6.8 (x-axis). Only players with more than 50 are included.
Average Tier The following graph shows a histogram of share of players (y-axis) with certain average tier during the update 6.8 (x-axis). Only players with more than 50 are included.
More Statistics by Tier here.
Players by Region This graphs shows players by region in the dataset who have played at least one game. More Statistics by region here. Please note, this does not mean all the players per server, but just those who have been recorded in the BlitzAnalysiz database.
 Tanks with the Highest WR This graph shows the tanks with the highest average WR during update 6.8. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR across all the tanks during the update. Only tanks with more than 100 players are listed. This may filter out few upcoming tanks that are being tested. More Tank Statistics here.
Tanks with the Highest WR - Table Average WR denotes average WR in a tank accross all the players during the update. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR accross all the tanks during the update.

Average tier WR vs average tier This graph shows player WR vs. average tier during the update 6.8. Minimum 50 battles required.
Share of players per WR per tier This chart shows share of players with certain WR (bar color-code) at certain tier (x-axis). Each players’ battles at different tiers have been taken into account as long as the player as at least 100 battles at a tier during the update.
Number of Battles per tier Share of battles per tank type per tier This chart shows share of battles fought at tier with with particular tank type during update 6.8. The width of the bar shows the share of battles in that tier’s tanks out of total number of battles in the dataset (118460352).
Share of battles per tank type per tier This chart shows share of battles fought at tier with with particular tank type during update 6.8. The width of the bar shows the share of battles in that tier’s tanks out of total number of battles in the dataset (118460352).

title: Statistics by Region
content:
Update 6.8 This page shows statistics per Blitz servers/regions (EU, NA, ASIA, Russia) during update 6.8. Statistics for the Chinese server are not available via WG API.
Number of players This graphs shows players by region in the dataset who have played at least one game. Please note, this does not mean all the players per server, but just those who have been recorded in the BlitzAnalysiz database.
WR Distribution This graph shows how the players overall WR during update 6.8 is distributed on diferent regions.
Cumulative distribution function This graphs shows the same information than the previous in different format. The curve tells how large share of players (y-axis) had WR less than (x-axis) during update 6.8.

title: Tier VII statistics
content:
This page list statistics of battles fought at tier VII during update 6.8.
Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.8.

title: Tier VI statistics
content:
This page list statistics of battles fought at tier VI during update 6.8.
Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.8.
On average, players played 63 battles. Median was 25 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.8 was 3532 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.

title: Tier V statistics
content:
This page list statistics of battles fought at tier V during update 6.8.
Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.8.
On average, players played 45 battles. Median was 14 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.8 was 2720 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.
Battles per player table The table below shows the (max) number of battles played during 6.8 by the X% most inactive players. A reading tip: 10% most active players played more than the 90% most inactive players.
  Show table      % of Players Battles during the update     0% 1   10% 1   25% 4   50% 14   75% 46   90% 114   100% 2720      Player WR distribution The following graph shows a histogram of players (y-axis) with certain WR during the update 6.8 (x-axis). Only players with more than 10 battles at the tier are included.
Share of battles per nation per tank type This chart shows share of battles per nation per tank type at tier V.
